Actions.Name: When an Asite workflow event is triggered
Actions.Description: Triggers a workflow event to upload a file to the project folder.

Actions.Name: Get file content
Actions.Description: Retrieves the file content from Asite.

Actions.Name: Set file metadata
Actions.Description: Retrieves the defined file meta-data and sets the values during the file upload process. Note: it is mandatory to set this action before the Create file action is triggered.

Actions.Name: Create file
Actions.Description: Upload a file in Asite project folder.
